ai-ja194:1.2_0: There is no world here in this world
ai-ja194:1.3_0: for the one with great wisdom is (may) power,
ai-ja194:1.4_0: Those who are at peace would protect me!”
ai-ja194:2.1_0: “This is the right time for you,
ai-ja194:2.2_0: But it is not the time to rain,
ai-ja194:2.3_0: and their heavens stand on the spot.
